TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Cyaw-wan-nipow-cya-ciw, title = Cyaw-wan-nipow-cya-ciw, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyaw-wan-nipow-cya-ciw} }

S.FORM: 喬萬尼·薄伽丘(Giovanni Boccaccio,1313年——1375年12月21日), . Cyaw-wan-ni. po-cya-ciw,"Giovanni Boccaccio 1313 a mihcaan katukuh 1375 a mihcaan 12 a bulad 21 a demiad", I-ta-li a nalimaan nisulitan cumelak tungus tu pilaylay, sibalucu'ay tu tademawan nu misulitay, atu misulitay tu cudad a tademaw ci Tan-tin,Pi-te-la-ke pangangan han Bow-low-lun-s misulitay cu cudad "San-cye". u tungus nisulitan "s-z-tan" nu Ow-cow nu misulita tu cudada i likisi u saayawaya nu ayzaay anisulitan. micili ciniza tu nu kiwkayay tu nu malumanay tu a nizatengan, sakakuay sa " malemeday i hekal", mapa u musakamuay tu nalimaan misulitay . nikauzipaan nu tademaw人物生平 ci Pow-cya-ciw sa u nu Bow-low-s nu misibayay a tademaw ci Kay-li-now a Po-cya-ciw atu cacay nu Ba-koway a tatayna u bucus a nilecuhan a wawa. pakayni i pulecuhan niza a kakitizaan, caay kahapinang ku nisulitan a paketun tu kamu. sakukamu u pulecuhan niza i Bow-low-s capuay nu Cye-ta-al-to, sakukamu i Pa-li ku pilecuhan. yu adidi' henay mapatay tu ku mulecuhay a wina niza, mikilul tu wama tayza i Bow-low-lun-s. caay ka tenes, siacawa aca ku wama, i kaedes nu wama atu pisapadek u wina niza i kalapadesan mauzip tu ya adidi'ay henay. zikus, mapatayza ni ama niza i Na-pow-li, i pikadem nu ama tu cacay a luma' nu misiwbayay caay ka namuh minanam tu sapisiwbay, inayi' nai' ku nilaculan. "十日談"中. u ama niza papinanamen aca ciniza tu nu hulic atu kiwkayay a hulican, nika anu canacanan a pisiwbayan atu nu hulicay, caay a lilid a manamuh ciniza. naadidi' manamuh misulit tu cudad ciniza, kakelul satu miteka minanam misulit tu cudad, muasip tu micidekay kapahay nu misulitan a nisanga'an. tuyni a nikauzipan a mitanam ciniza tayza i tuseay nu binawlan atu misiwbayay a tademaw a nikauzip atu mizateng tu nabalucu'an, a papulung tu sakunuayay tu pisulit tu 'se-ze-tan"nay. . i Na-pow-li a nikauzipan, ci Pow-cya-ciw amicumun tu An-cye-aw a Low-pow-te luma' nu Kowang. itini, u makedecay ku balucu' niza atu tineng mahamin a patahkalan. malecad tu katuuday a tademaw ciniza tu nu naybalucu'ay nizatengan nu misulit tu dadiw cudad, u migikiway, miduducay tu nu kamisama, nu hulicay sakatuud ku nisacabayan, amitiyung tu kakitaan nu mikeliday a nikauzipan. a kakapah ku nikauzip niza, misatabaki tu sapiazih tu lalangawan nalimaan, talaayaw palikat ciniza tu nu sumamaday a lalangawan atu namuh misulitan tu cudad. i luma' nu Hungti matineng aca ciniza tu ci Low-pow-tean u padek a tatayna a wawaan ni Ma-li-ya, manamuh tu cinizaan. uyni a ngatuan mitanam ciniza tu nikasasumidang ka sasungaay, i pisulitan tu cudad nisangaan niza mutesek ku nisubelidan tu nisulitan, anuaya i nisuit tu cudad ciniza misanga' tu nu wayway nu tatayna, taneng maazih taahkal ku adingu ni Ma-li-ya. 1340年冬, . 1340 a mihcaan tu kasienawan, po-cya-ciw nu wamaay a pisiwbay a kawaw masepay, caay tu kakapah ku keyzay, caay tu pakalekal. ci po-cya-ciw caay tu ka hiza naayaway ka kapah lihalay ku nikauzip, taluma' satu i Bow-lou-s. 1350年, "神曲"討論. 1350 a mihcaan Po-cya-ciw atu misulitay tu cudad masasutineng ci Pi-te-la-kean, sakatusa a mihcaan, mapatudud ciniza papitakus tu mapaydangay ci Pi-te-la-ke taluma' i Bow-low-lun-s mitelung matatengil tu migingkuway. namahini, uyni tatusaay u sitengay a tademaw sibalucu'ay tu nu tademawan. patizeng tu kasasungaay a malacabay. ci Pow-cya-ciw sabalucu' sa migingkiw tu kasumamadanay a misulit tu cudad, mala u mutesekay ku tineng tu nu sibalucu'ay tu nu tademawan, pabelin tu ciniza tu nisulitan ni He-ma, i pisuped, pabelin atu pacuyaku tu kasumamadan a cudadan tu nipatahkal tu nisulitan tu kasasatiman a nipaini. i kabalakian tu a mihcaan, pasaicelang sa ciniza tuyni "kasatiman a dadiw" pacuyaku a musakamu, namitelung tu Bow-low-lun-s nu talakaway a cacudadan matatengil tu "kasatiman a dadiw."

喬萬尼·薄伽丘(Giovanni Boccaccio,1313年——1375年12月21日), . Cyaw-wan-ni. po-cya-ciw,"Giovanni Boccaccio 1313 a mihcaan katokoh 1375 a mihcaan 12 a bolad 21 a demiad", I-ta-li a nalimaan nisolitan comelak tongos to pilaylay, sibaloco'ay to tademawan no misolitay, ato misolitay to codad a tademaw ci Tan-tin,Pi-te-la-ke pangangan han Bow-low-lon-s misolitay co codad "San-cye". o tongos nisolitan "s-z-tan" no Ow-cow no misolita to codada i likisi o saayawaya no ayzaay anisolitan. micili ciniza to no kiwkayay to no malomanay to a nizatengan, sakakoay sa " malemeday i hekal", mapa o mosakamoay to nalimaan misolitay . nikaozipaan no tademaw人物生平 ci Pow-cya-ciw sa o no Bow-low-s no misibayay a tademaw ci Kay-li-now a Po-cya-ciw ato cacay no Ba-koway a tatayna o bocos a nilecohan a wawa. pakayni i polecohan niza a kakitizaan, caay kahapinang ko nisolitan a paketon to kamo. sakokamo o polecohan niza i Bow-low-s capoay no Cye-ta-al-to, sakokamo i Pa-li ko pilecohan. yo adidi' henay mapatay to ko molecohay a wina niza, mikilol to wama tayza i Bow-low-lon-s. caay ka tenes, siacawa aca ko wama, i kaedes no wama ato pisapadek o wina niza i kalapadesan maozip to ya adidi'ay henay. zikos, mapatayza ni ama niza i Na-pow-li, i pikadem no ama to cacay a loma' no misiwbayay caay ka namoh minanam to sapisiwbay, inayi' nai' ko nilacolan. "十日談"中. o ama niza papinanamen aca ciniza to no holic ato kiwkayay a holican, nika ano canacanan a pisiwbayan ato no holicay, caay a lilid a manamoh ciniza. naadidi' manamoh misolit to codad ciniza, kakelol sato miteka minanam misolit to codad, moasip to micidekay kapahay no misolitan a nisanga'an. toyni a nikaozipan a mitanam ciniza tayza i toseay no binawlan ato misiwbayay a tademaw a nikaozip ato mizateng to nabaloco'an, a papolong to sakonoayay to pisolit to 'se-ze-tan"nay. . i Na-pow-li a nikaozipan, ci Pow-cya-ciw amicomon to An-cye-aw a Low-pow-te loma' no Kowang. itini, o makedecay ko baloco' niza ato tineng mahamin a patahkalan. malecad to katooday a tademaw ciniza to no naybaloco'ay nizatengan no misolit to dadiw codad, o migikiway, midodocay to no kamisama, no holicay sakatood ko nisacabayan, amitiyong to kakitaan no mikeliday a nikaozipan. a kakapah ko nikaozip niza, misatabaki to sapiazih to lalangawan nalimaan, talaayaw palikat ciniza to no somamaday a lalangawan ato namoh misolitan to codad. i loma' no Hongti matineng aca ciniza to ci Low-pow-tean o padek a tatayna a wawaan ni Ma-li-ya, manamoh to cinizaan. oyni a ngatoan mitanam ciniza to nikasasomidang ka sasongaay, i pisolitan to codad nisangaan niza motesek ko nisobelidan to nisolitan, anoaya i nisoit to codad ciniza misanga' to no wayway no tatayna, taneng maazih taahkal ko adingo ni Ma-li-ya. 1340年冬, . 1340 a mihcaan to kasienawan, po-cya-ciw no wamaay a pisiwbay a kawaw masepay, caay to kakapah ko keyzay, caay to pakalekal. ci po-cya-ciw caay to ka hiza naayaway ka kapah lihalay ko nikaozip, taloma' sato i Bow-loo-s. 1350年, "神曲"討論. 1350 a mihcaan Po-cya-ciw ato misolitay to codad masasotineng ci Pi-te-la-kean, sakatosa a mihcaan, mapatodod ciniza papitakos to mapaydangay ci Pi-te-la-ke taloma' i Bow-low-lon-s mitelong matatengil to migingkoway. namahini, oyni tatosaay o sitengay a tademaw sibaloco'ay to no tademawan. patizeng to kasasongaay a malacabay. ci Pow-cya-ciw sabaloco' sa migingkiw to kasomamadanay a misolit to codad, mala o motesekay ko tineng to no sibaloco'ay to no tademawan, pabelin to ciniza to nisolitan ni He-ma, i pisoped, pabelin ato pacoyako to kasomamadan a codadan to nipatahkal to nisolitan to kasasatiman a nipaini. i kabalakian to a mihcaan, pasaicelang sa ciniza toyni "kasatiman a dadiw" pacoyako a mosakamo, namitelong to Bow-low-lon-s no talakaway a cacodadan matatengil to "kasatiman a dadiw."
